title: Data Scientist
desc: Requires Python, SQL, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Statistics

title: Machine Learning Engineer
desc: Focus on deploying ML models at scale. Skills: Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Docker, AWS, MLOps

title: Full Stack Developer
desc: Requires JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, SQL, Git, Docker

title: Backend Developer
desc: Requires Java, Spring Boot, SQL, REST APIs, Microservices, Docker, AWS

title: Frontend Developer
desc: Requires HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, Redux, UI/UX

title: Cloud Engineer

title: AI Researcher
desc: Focus on LLMs and deep learning. Requires Python, PyTorch, Transformers, Mathematics, Research Skills

title: Data Analyst

title: Cybersecurity Analyst

title: DevOps Engineer
